'''A Pulse of Ice and Wind''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[freeze]] the [[Solitary Suanni]], and then trigger [[Shatter]] while it is [[frozen]].
